The LCD should only update when a relevant property is changed, and should only be listening for property changes when open. Not sure why it is registered as a properly listener in this case.

added in a workbenchjob to LaunchConfigurationsDialog#propertyChanged, to ensure that we access only the correct context.

fixed in HEAD
